content:
To generate questions like the ones above, you can provide me with the following prompt:

"Create objective-style questions that use the Pythagorean Theorem and are at the 10th grade level. One leg or hypotenuse of the right triangle must be given, and the question should ask for the length of the remaining leg. Use real-life scenarios or open-ended problem-solving methods when possible. Use LaTex for mathematical terms."

Please let me know if you have any other specifications or if you want me to focus on any specific concepts or methods.
